scripts.test:withZaleniumSetup: npm run --silent zalenium:setup && docker wait zalenium && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio wdio.conf.zalenium.js
scripts.zalenium:setup: docker run -dit --rm -ti --name zalenium -p 4444:4444 -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v /tmp/videos:/home/seluser/videos --privileged dosel/zalenium start --maxTestSessions 6 --videoRecordingEnabled false
